channel.title: Portfolio on Hacksplained
channel.description: Recent content in Portfolio on Hacksplained

item.title: Burp Suite
item.description: Burp Suite is the web app pentester’s favorite tool. There is probably no other tool in the world that finds heavier usage during manual pentest engagements than this one.

item.title: OWASP Juice Shop
item.description: OWASP juice shop is currently the most extensive single page application (SPA) out there with deliberately built in vulnerabilities.
